entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light this evening. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly cloudy. High plus 2.
